name: berdcajon v1
html_description: An innovative electronic cajon, with silent pads and configurable by the control panel and by the berdperc software.

name: berdcajon v2
html_description:
A powerful acoustic cajon with electronic drum pads on the side configurable by the control panel and by the berdperc software.

Unlike v1, this version has powerful accoustic sounds you can also play along with.

name: berdpad
